org.gearman

Interface GearmanPersistable


  • public interface GearmanPersistable
    An object representing a persistable background job. It contains all of the information used to execute a gearman job. Instances of this class is used by the GearmanPersistence to persist background jobs.
    Author:
    isaiah

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long epochTime()
      Returns the epoch time for when this job can execute.
      byte[] getData()
      Returns the jobs data
      java.lang.String getFunctionName()
      Returns the function name
      byte[] getJobHandle()
      The job handle defined by the gearman server
      GearmanJobPriority getPriority()
      Returns the job's priority level
      byte[] getUniqueID()
      The unique id defined by the client to identify jobs within a function

        long epochTime()
        Returns the epoch time for when this job can execute. The given job will not be sent to a worker until after the epoch time has elapsed
